reviewText:
The contents overrap other courses and very confusing explanation.
Pls work hard to make it easier to understand it.
Content of the course and presentation was great. But the audio quality was not so good. As they are echos on the background and need to set to high volume to heard the speaker.
This is a very basic course and should state that in the description.
so so. instructor cant really present. a tad boring

Peer reviewing depends on the comprehension and perceptive skills of the reviewer which may skew the grading or score. The grading must be performed by the instructor to keep the results unbiased and standardized.
quite interestingformat of peer exchange/ mutual grading lacking transparency, loosing speed & flexibilitycourse rather recommended for junior level
Very good course. But some check should be there for peer reviews.

It is good course for someone who regularly works in globalized work environment.

The course is pretty good. Peer assessment was not the greatest experience as there was a lot of documents completely unrelated to the course coming through taking away from the opportunity to hone feedback skills and see how my work was in relation to my peers.
This was useful course for covering the topic and well balanced assignments
has opened my eyes to language on another spectrum
Engaging and well designed curriculum
Very informative. Good job!
Interesting course. Easy to understand, interactive and beneficial
Learned a lot of good communication
Useful to write a biography for publications / own professional website. Helpful for writing a cover letter effectively.
nice content

The teaching mothod is not really interesting but the knowledge provied is worth-learning. The structure of lesson is easy to follow, concise and the test is good to evaluate how much you understand the lesson.
Muy bueno y cuidadoso de los detalles.Gracias

Good

I recommned this class to anyone who would like to learn how to do a clear and consice presentation.  I am learning to put my ideas in order before I speak so my audience, whether is one person or several, understand with clarity what I am trying to express.
It's such a very good course! I have learned a lot from this course. Thanks so much.
Lecturer is good. We can easy understans the course because he use the real life example.
it was an amazing course
I have a clearer in depth understanding of writing resume and cover letter
This course is generally helpful towards fulfilling life goals.
Excellent course . I did learn a lot from this communication course. NUS has a structure way of teaching and it is easy to understand .
Very good course
It was good experience
It helped me to polish my communication skills, which are key to open doors in all levels. Thank you teachers !
it was good
Was great and detailed.  Just love the course
The course is presented well and provides valuable skills that you can apply in the work place.
It was a fun learning experience. Thank you
very informative
I learned a lot! The exercises are just right. Thank you so much NUS!
great course
I enjoyed doing the course
Learned so much from this course.
Highly enlightened from this course understanding the 3 categories of credibility and apply it in practical life to 'persuade' people to realise goals for positive impact purpose.
Good and informative
This was a very interesting course. I learn a lot about persuasive writing and communication. I feel confident that I can write myself a cover letter, as well as a biography.
Wonderful

I enjoyed this course, absolutely amazing!!!! I have learned a lot which I know will contributed greatly with my communication, The instructor was very good. Congratulations to you. I can't recall the last time I was so enthusiastic about take a course that is not related to my field of interest.
Excellent plus the examples where so easy to understand and connect to.
Very useful to delvelop your leadership skills by persuasive communication to your subordinates
Knowledgeable instructor, and lots of useful examples. This course will help you identify WHAT to write to be seen as credible and persuasive. Highly recommended!
This course has really helped to improve my communication skills.

I learnt a lot in this course all thanks to God and the wonderful facilitator/lecturer. I would definitely work on improving my communication in terms of credibility and persuasion. I love the course and I am really impressed, particularly with the peer grade assessment as I was able to learn from others. There are really amazing and brilliant individuals in the world despite the cultural differences!. Thank you University of Singapore, thank you Coursera.
great course!
Very informative and useful course.

exceptional course and very educative
EXCELLENT COURSE! WELL STRUCTURED AND DELIVERED. I LEARNED AN IMPORTANT INFORMATION TOUGHT IN THIS COURSE.
Excellent, thank you.
nice

the course is well-crafted and designed, the lecturer is competent and the contents are highly applicable to every-day conversations - in writing as well as in spoken communication. So far, I like this course best out of this entire specialization series.
